entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
